Class I18nUtilities

    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.util.I18nUtilities

  • public final class I18nUtilities
extends Object
    Internationalisation utility methods.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Yiannis Paschalidis

    • Method Detail

      • getResourceBundleBaseName

        public static String getResourceBundleBaseName()
        Retrieves the resource bundle base name.
        Returns:
        the resource bundle base name.

      • asMessage

        public static Serializable asMessage(String text,
                     Serializable... args)
        Converts a message String and optional message arguments to a an appropriate format for internationalisation.
        Parameters:
        text - the message text.
        args - the message arguments.
        Returns:
        a message in an appropriate format for internationalisation, may be null.

      • format

        public static String format(Locale locale,
            Object message)

        Attempts to format the given message for the given locale.

        If a locale is provided, this method will attempt to load the text from a resource bundle. If message is a Message and has format arguments, then MessageFormat will be used to format the final message.

        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to use, or null to use the current UIContext's Locale.
        message - the message object to format.
        Returns:
        the formatted message.

      • format

        public static String format(Locale locale,
            String text,
            Object... args)
        Formats the given text, optionally using locale-specific text.
        Parameters:
        locale - The locale to use to look up a message, may be null.
        text - the text / resource bundle key to use.
        args - the message arguments, may be null.
        Returns:
        the formatted text.

      • getEffectiveLocale

        public static Locale getEffectiveLocale()
        Get the locale currently in use.
        Returns:
        The currently active locale.

      • getLocalisedText

        public static String getLocalisedText(Locale locale,
                      String text)
        Attempts to retrieve the localized message for the given text.
        Parameters:
        locale - the locale to retrieve the message for, or null for the default locale.
        text - the text message or id to look up.
        Returns:
        the localised text if found, otherwise null.
